channel.title: javaScript on IT生活
channel.description: Recent content in javaScript on IT生活

item.title: Js通过url下载文件
item.description: fetch(src).then(res => res.blob().then(blob => { let a = document.createElement('a'); let url = window.URL.createObjectURL(blob); a.href = url; a.download = name; a.click(); window.URL.revokeObjectURL(url); }))
